content: Never pay another overweight fine at the airport by checking your luggage beforehand with this portable weight scale. This convenient and portable tool attaches to the suitcase’s handlebar and displays its weight on an LCD display when you lift up the bag.

Kickstart your morning in the tastiest way possible with a healthy serving of breakfast swimming in caffeinated maple syrup. Simply pour the syrup onto your pancakes or waffles, and you’ll quickly find that coffee won’t be necessary to start your morning.

Keep the entertainment flowing even after your luxurious iPad’s battery dies with the LEGO brick mini iPad cover. Apart from protecting your iPad, this colorful cover provides a fully functional LEGO brick pad you can use to play and build stuff with your LEGO blocks.

Turn your yard into an action-packed winter wonderland with the backyard ice rink. The kit provides everything you need to make your very own backyard ice rink – complete with custom paint job. The kids can play all day without worrying about encountering thin ice.

Strap up for wedding season with the dual camera holster and get two times the photography done. This stylish chestnut colored harness is worn in an “X” pattern across the back and leaves both cameras at hip length so you can easily switch between cameras.

Save thousands on expensive drinks and cover charges when you stay at home night after night completing the 32,000 piece puzzle. This mammoth puzzle weights a whopping 42 pounds and sprawls over an area of 17′ x 6′ after the 32,256 colorful pieces are assembled.

Give your bar a surrealist element when you serve up some cold ones on the sliced beer glasses. These novelty beer glasses create the optical illusion that the glass has been sliced into three separate compartments and will be sure to blow some drunk minds.

Increase your lifting power exponentially without ever spending time at the gym with the forearm lifting straps. These durable straps are made to handle the rigors of lifting heavy furniture and make it remarkably easy to lift over sized pieces in the household.

Relive the wonderful memories of your favorite decade with the 90s coloring book. This entertaining book offers page after page of 90s-tastic images like the Fresh Prince, Friends, and the Spice Girls – all waiting to be brought back to life by your colorful imagination.

Teach your pint size jet setter about the finer things in life from early on with the mini Ferrari battery car. This exotic battery car is styled like an expensive Ferrari and comes with a 12V battery under the hood that provides enough juice to smoke any other kid at the playground.

Upon sighting shark fins bobbing around your drink just remember to keep calm and stay cool – icy cool. The shark fin ice tray creates unique fin-shaped cubes that float around your drink as they cool down your liquid contents and frighten children.

With the healthy ice cream maker you won’t have to sacrifice flavor to enjoy a nutritious snack. The ice cream maker instantly turns your favorite fruits into a smooth and creamy blend that’ll stimulate the taste buds without any preservatives or added sugar.

Show off your British pride while you take a stroll with the British flag umbrella on a rainy day. Next time the weather gets as gloomy as jolly old England’s just grab a hold of the ergonomically designed handle and let the British flag keep you nice and dry.

Awe in amazement as you watch two of Earth’s mightiest heroes use their brute strength to hold up your books with the Superman and Batman bookends. This geeky bookend pits the caped crusader against the first son of Krypton in an explosive battle.

Wake up like movie stars do when you awaken to the pleasant beeping of the movie slate digital alarm clock. This novelty clock looks great whether set on a flat surface or hung on the wall as it displays the date and time, right down a hundredth of a second.

Follow in the steps of Kirk and Piccard when you sit in the inflatable Star Trek captain’s chair. The chair comfortably seats an adult sized Trekkie and comes with various lights and buttons painted on the arm rest so you can live out your fantasies of being the Captain.

Practice your music skills while in class with the musical ruler. Apart from displaying inches and centimeters, this unique ruler also showcases musical notes – place your finger over the desired note and flick the end of the ruler to create beautiful sounds.

With the giant E.T. doll, you’ll be able to hang out with your favorite alien without having to worry about the Feds trying to hunt him down. This ultra soft  stuffed doll stands at 42″ tall and makes an excellent cuddle buddy while lounging around the house.

Hold the vast cosmos in the palm of your hand with the galaxy night light. This novelty night light features a realistic 3D printed photo of the galaxy that comes to life once the light is turned on. A great accessory for brightening up any dim part of the house.

Everyone has a hard time waking up, even your coffee mug. The wake up coffee mug begins its day sleepy and slowly wakes up as you fill it up chalk full of caffeine. The special heat sensitive porcelain changes the look from sleepy to wide awake.

Avoid becoming roadkill while biking the streets with the turn signal gloves. The gloves are designed to fit comfortably while featuring an LED turn signal light the rider can easily activate with their thumb while maintaining their concentration on the road.

Turn the holiday season on its head when you decorate your home with the upside down Christmas tree. This peculiar pine tree stands at 7.5 feet – completely upside down. It gives the home a festive and whimsical touch no guest will be able to ignore.

Never again miss the lyrics or notes to the song you’re playing by keeping the guitar smartphone clip attached while you perform. This nifty tool accommodates both acoustic and electric guitars, and adjusts to fit all brands of smartphones – even if they’re in bulky cases.

Convert any hollowed out fruit or veggie into a vibrant, all natural keg with this watermelon tap kit. The tap screws directly into a watermelon and spews out the delicious contents through a chrome-finished spout you control with a brass handle.

Pop open your heady brew like a mighty god by using Thor’s hammer bottle opener. Crafted out of solid metal, once Thor’s hammer is firmly in your grip you’ll be able to open up beverages with the speed and skill of an all-powerful deity if ye be worthy.

Take your workouts to the next level with the Titin weighted workout shirt. This unique fourteen pocket shirt allows you to hold up to eight pounds of tight fitting gel insert weights onto your torso, so you can add more resistance to your typical workout.

Help your tiny adventurer blaze through the trails at the park like a true explorer with the 4×4 toy offroader. This puppy sits on 4 monster wheels and runs on a 24 volt high performance rechargeable battery capable of hitting speeds up to 7 mph on grass.

Make your baking come to life after preparing a batch of treats using the 3D safari cookie cutters. These unique cookie cutters create puzzle-like pieces you assemble to create various creatures from the animal kingdom – like a mighty lion or a giraffe.

titleEN: I Love Crack Whores Bumper Sticker
content: Show support for some of the hardest working people on the block when you slap the “I Love Crack Whores” bumper sticker on the back of the car. This magnetic novelty bumper sticker sticks on to the car instantly and makes for a hysterical practical joke to play on friends.

Perform an at-home haircut with professional-like quality with help from the hairline grooming tool. This useful accessory makes trimming the back of your hair easy and convenient. It’ll keep your from making embarrassing mistakes and keep you looking fresh in between cuts.

Avoid unwanted visitors and the rough, uneven terrain mother nature offers when you spend the night in the hammock tent. The tent offers occupants a spacious tensioned triple hammock floor in addition to an unparalleled view of the majestic outdoors.

Make your love of word games – and morbid sense of humor – evident in your home’s decor with the hanging man light switch pull. This soft rubber light pull measures around 5 inches long and is conveniently hangs around ready to give you a helping hand.

Cover up your phone’s nether region in the naughtiest way possible with the iPhone panties. These custom made panties will make your phone look devastatingly sexy while protecting it’s bottom port from creepy USB cables looking to get “just the tip” in.

Good things come in small packages, just like the Doctor Who TARDIS projector clock. The TARDIS shaped clock stands at 4.5″ and projects the time onto the wall or ceiling in addition to making cool TARDIS noises when the alarm goes off.

Experience a new level of bedside comfort with the wedge pillow. This multi-use pillow can be positioned in a variety of different ways, so you can use it to read a book, watch TV, or even get into some advanced sexual positions if you’re into that sort of thing.

What better way to prepare for a delicious, artery clogging breakfast than with the bacon body wash. A nice coat of this body wash will have you feeling refreshed while leaving behind an intoxication bacon smell that will linger throughout the entire day.

Hang the Star Wars Christmas stockings by the fireplace and you’re sure to get everything you asked Santa for – even if you’ve been a naughty little Jedi. These festive stockings are approximately 18″ long and come decorated in the likeness of your favorite characters.

Enemies won’t stand a chance against you with the tactical tomahawk firmly in your stonecold hands. With its razor sharp ax head, steel body, and crowbar built into the bottom, this is the go to weapon when you need to get out of a sticky situation.

Taking the LEGO brick erasers to school is like getting to to play with your toys when you’re not supposed to – pure bliss. The creative LEGO block design of the erasers makes them the only piece of school supplies your kids will actually get excited over.

Bring the party home when you add the Pac-Man arcade cocktail cabinet to your man cave. This retro entertainment console features 13 of the greatest arcade games of all time and will keep family and friends entertained for hours on end.

Illuminate the darkest and hardest to reach places with ease using the world’s smallest stick on LED. Virtually indestructible, this light comes with a high strength adhesive that’ll stick anywhere and includes long lasting alkaline batteries.

With the heated shoe insoles you’ll be able to keep your feet nice and toasty no matter how ludicrously cold the weather outside becomes. These custom rechargeable insoles fit snuggly inside the boot and are operated through a convenient wireless remote.

Personalize your door in the ultimate form of geek decor with the Han Solo frozen in carbonite door decal. This iconic moment of Star Wars history is easily removed and re-positionable without requiring any tools and without doing any damage to your door.

Tell the world to bite your shiny metal laptop with the Futurama Bender laptop decal. This high quality decal provides your laptop with the attitude and conniving spirit its been lacking – it’ll be up to its motherboard in cigar smoke and robot stripper glitter in no time at all.

When it’s too cold outside to build snowmen, head indoors and warm up by the oven while baking these frosted snowman cupcake molds. Each set includes four silicone rubber cupcake molds that are perfect for baking up some delicious and festive holiday treats.

Eliminate charging cord tangles and tripping hazards with the plug-in iPhone case. Apart from protecting your iPhone from minor bumps and scratches, it features a handy design that allows you to plug the case directly into the wall outlet to charge your phone.

Keep your tumbling skills as sharp as ever with the trampoline blanket cover. This 100% cotton duvet fits over any twin mattress and sports a fun and interactive design that encourages your children to jump on their beds – something parents everywhere will appreciate.

Ensure you distribute that delicious and cheesy pie equally among all your friends with the tactical laser guided pizza cutter. This state-of-the-art slicer lays our a laser path for you to follow with the circular blade to cut slices with deadly precision.

Take your newborn baby’s body temperature without humiliating him by sticking a thermometer up his virgin ass – instead simply use the baby pacifier thermometer. This clever device doubles as a calming pacifier as well as a tool to easily get your baby’s temperature.

Automate your household cleaning with the floor mopping robot. This little robot picks up where your vacuum bot left off. This compact robot contains smart sensors that avoid stairs, rugs and other raised surfaces and can mop your home for up to 2 hours on a single charge.

Travelling with your axe has gotten a whole lot easier thanks to the folding guitar. This expertly crafted guitar features a folding neck-hinge system, cutting the instrument’s size by half to facilitate transport. It’s the ultimate instrument for the travelling musician.

What good is it having a fully stocked bar if you don’t know how to use it. The Gentleman’s Guide To Cocktails contains page after page of sophisticated and informative illustrations that demonstrate the proper way to prepare over 150 drinks every classy guy should know.

Complement your look with the must-have accessory of the fleeting moment – the chrome stick-on nails. These metallic nails will make any outfit pop, they are easy to apply and last up to seven days while the metallic toes can last for up to two weeks.

Think of the smartphone controlled lightbulb as the Clapper of the 21st century. This innovative product connects to an app on your phone, allowing you to control it remotely. Apart from providing instant light, it is also dimmable you can set the mood.

The dragon wrap earring provides a great way to accentuate your medieval sense of style. This high quality alloy plated earring features a wrap around design that stretches through the entire length of the ear to create the illusion a mystical dragon is resting on it.

With the Big Book of Breasts 3D you’ll be able to stare at dozens of humongous home-grown mammary glands without getting slapped or called a pervert. It’s page after page of “artistic” poses and pictures displaying glorious breasts in jaw dropping 3D.

Satisfy your beast sized morning appetite like a true hombre with the man bowl. This high quality ceramic bowl  is designed to like a classic dog bowl and measures a massive 10 inches all around while sporting a bold “MAN” label on the side for added manliness.

Tune up your bicycle by giving it that extra juice it’s been missing with the bicycle exhaust. This customized exhaust system installs easily on the back of the bike and creates a powerful motorcycle-like roar every kid on the block is sure to hear.

When you’re in serious need of a sugar boost, refuel your depleted body with some chocolate ammo. This delicious kit comes encased in a mini ammo tin and allows you to make up to ten chocolaty bullet cavities per batch from the comfort of your own kitchen bunker.

There’s no such thing as too young for a little bling bling – so help your newborn run the streets from a young age with the pacifier grillz. This pimped out pacifier keeps your young G calm and quite while they flash their gold and diamond covered smile at the world.

Stop attracting Mr. Wrong – with the asshole repellent spray you can ensure that only good men will be coming your way on a night out. This life changing spray is scientifically engineered to repel not just assholes but also douche bags, pricks, and other types of losers.

Everything is more fun with googley eyes, so brighten up a bad day with googley eyes push pins. The cartoon-like nature of these push pins is great for anthropomorphizing important memos, bulletins, and anything else that causes you stress.

You haven’t experienced true comfort until you’ve plopped down on the giant beanbag. This massive and ridiculously cozy beanbag comfortably seats two people and provides the ultimate place for to nap, hang out, or just waste the day away like a lazy slob.

Level up your charisma and speechcraft with the Geek’s Guide To Dating Book. This informative book serves as an excellent guide to help you get offline and interact directly with people in the real world – covering subjects like meeting women and dating.

Quench your thirst and entertain friends and family by providing a them with a good laugh using these nose paper cups. These humorous paper cups feature a realistic nose design that creates the illusion of your nose when you go to take a sip.

There’s no better utensil than the finger spoons when you’re eating a quick snack on the go. These plastic and reusable spoons fit over the fingers and transform them into a handy utensils that help eating your favorite snack while your fingers stay completely clean.

The pocket water filter is the revolutionary new device every outdoorsman and adventurer should own. It’s lightweight, easy to transport, and made with superb craftsmanship. With just a few pumps you’ll be turning any water into drinkable water.

Get your daily fix of tobacco without all of the other nasty stuff that will damage your body after years of use with the electronic cigarette. Remember kids, everyone looks cool with a cigarette, but nobody looks cool with an oxygen tank – except maybe the Fonz.

Now you can enjoy the great sport of bicycling during the winter months with the bicycle handlebar mittens. These easily to use mittens wrap around your handlebars so you can keep your hands warm, making winter bicycling less painful on your warm blooded body.

Reward your well behaved canine using the dog treat Pez dispenser. This over-sized dispenser comes packed with six all natural dog treats with real meat flavor. It makes an excellent gift idea for both dogs and their Pez dispenser collecting masters.

Start your morning off right with a beer in the shower using the shower beer koozie. The koozie comes in every color under the sun and features large suction cup located at the back so your hands can remain free when you need to shampoo or soap up.

The melting iPhone case covers your fragile phone with a protective film of slime. The case sports a fun and textured design that helps improve grip and includes an inner felt placement for extra protection. The melting iPhone case is the complete package.

Slice open your mail with striking precision by using the Samurai sword letter opener.  This stainless steel letter opener comes styled like a traditional Japanese Samurai sword, right down to the black chord wrapped handle. It also makes a great display mounted on its rack.

Don’t venture into another cesspool of filth – otherwise known as public bathrooms – without the public toilet survival kit. This handy kit includes everything you need to make it through the unpleasant ordeal without catching any weird and unwanted diseases.

Make a deposit at the sperm bank every time you bust a load of coins. Designed after the ever vigilant life giving orifice swimmers, the sperm bank makes an excellent storage spot for loose change and bills. And best of all, it’s not sticky!

Enhance the flavor of any drink with the gummy worm straw. These whimsical and tasty looking straws are designed just like the delicious gummy worms we all love. These wacky straws will turn lunch time into the most enjoyable part of your kids day.

Get some help preparing your feast from your favorite mob family with the Sopranos Family Cook Book. The cook book is packed with page after page of pictures of the cast members and good hearty Italian meals like Corrado “Junior” Soprano’s pasta fazool – buon appetito.

Spruce up your bland toilet at home with the Aqua Teen Hunger Forced themed Carl Brutananadilewski toilet cover and bib. This freakin’ sweat toilet decor features life like detail, including a ticklish mustache to sit on and accurately placed pit stains.

Look fabulous – day or night – with the illuminated hair extensions. These colorful extensions are the stylish accents that’ll add a bit of flare to any look. They’re easy to apply, come in various vibrant colors, and have a battery life that lasts for hours.

The story will be just part of the amusement when using the zipper bookmark to save your reading place. This creatively designed bookmark holds up very well to daily use and the fun zipper shape makes it easy to spot where you last left off.

There’s no need to enter a sweepstakes in order to own the classy leg lamp from the beloved holiday film A Christmas Story. This stylish light fixture is a miniature replica of the one from the film and makes a great gift idea for the home of any movie buff.

Keep every knife in your collection razor sharp with the two stage pro knife sharpener. The sharpener is ergonomically designed to provide a comfortable and natural grip in addition to providing two stages of sharpening – fine and coarse.

Start your day off the right way with the toaster egg poacher. This 3-in-one wonder is the ultimate breakfast machine. The toaster’s unique design allows you to toast bread, cook an  egg, and heat up some scrumptious breakfast meats!

Add some personality to your car with the car headlight eyelashes. They look good on any model and will turn heads wherever you go. They’ll give your car the long, smooth and voluminous lashes that will have the macho muscle cars drooling over.

Easily clean up a pile of toys in mere seconds after playtime is over with the toy scraper cleaning tool. The scraper is made from a durable yet lightweight material that’s fun to use and great for all ages. It’s a great addition for any classroom or homes with children.

Spice up the holidays with these sriracha candy canes. These super hot, individually wrapped candy canes come decorated in traditional Christmas colors, while their unique flavor makes them a great mix of sweet and spicy for the holiday season.

Don’t become the next “Hoarders” superstar – transform the heaping mess known as your garage into the cleanest room in the home with the garage organization kit. It allows you to neatly hang all your stuff along the wall so that they’re visible and easy to reach.

Take pride in your nerdy accomplishments by wearing the geek achievement badges shirt. This geeky garment comes decorated with all the badges a high ranking nerd such as yourself has amassed over the years of not going outside or getting physical activity.

Now with the hangover prevention patch you’ll be able to drink until your hearts content, no matter what day of the week it is. Once applied, the patch replenishes the body with essential vitamins and nutrients lost during an epic night of excessive alcohol consumption.

Store your photo albums and other multimedia files like a true professional with the mini camera USB drive lens. Modeled after a high quality Canon camera, the lens snaps off to reveal a 4GB USB drive compatible with all operating systems.

Add the perfect touch to your geeky Christmas tree with these Boba Fett string lights. They’re designed with intricate detailing and are shaped like miniature replicas of Boba Fett’s iconic helmet – a must have for any Star Wars themed holiday celebration.

No one can claim to be a true die-hard comic fan without having read the Marvel Comics Untold Story. This compelling book tells the story of how Marvel Comics came to be what it is today. It’s the gripping narrative no geek should miss out on.

The kitty cat paw doorstop is the cutest way to keep any door in the home wide open. This novelty doorstop is designed to look like a protruding paw from your feline friend and is made from a tough and resistant material that will stand up to heavy use.

Accentuate your car’s eardrum shattering sound system with sound activated car stickers. These high-tech stickers feature LEDs that move to the rhythm of the music and are coated with a protective membrane to ensure they’ll perform in all types of weather.

Prepare drinks and cocktails like a sir with the gentleman’s ice cube tray. Rather than serve guests boring old blocks, you can garnish their drink with a fanciful hat, distinguished mustache, fashionable bow tie, or even distinguished spectacles.

Protect your precious smartphone with the same level of cushioning it had the day it arrived from the factory with the iPhone bubble wrap case. This novelty case shields your phone against minor falls and scratches by containing it in a bubble wrap exterior.

Keep cool in the midst of a heated coding session with the USB LED fan clock. This neat little device plugs right into your USB slot and displays the time on a spinning LED display that doubles as a fan. It’s the coolest way to keep track of the hours spent on the computer.

Get into the <del>mood</del> spirit of Christmas with the reindeer threesome sweater. This lovely and cheeky hand knit sweater displays a gay old scene where we see Dasher on, Rudolph on, Vixen as they demonstrate what the Christmas spirit is all about – love and sharing.

Make the most joyous time of the year even better with the bacon stocking hanging from your home’s fireplace. Perfect for the bacon lover in your family – the stocking is decorated with white felt bacon fat that is big enough to hold up to 4 pounds of uncooked bacon inside.

Make playtime more interactive than ever for your little youngsters with the 3D play rug. This lively rug sprawls over an area of 59″ x 40″ and displays a pleasant little town equipped with 3 dimensional roads, buildings and even a soccer field for recreation.
